name: All-in-One WP Preloader
author: Monzur Alam

sections.description:
All-in-One WP Preloader

All-in-One WP Preloader gives your site a loading screen without writing any code.

It’s great and lightweight. Simply activate the plugin and enable the Preloader from the “All-in-One WP Preloader” menu tab.

Works everywhere

All-in-One WP Preloader on all major browsers and you can use it on any theme and any device.

Features of All-in-One WP Preloader

  • Quick to set up
  • Pure CSS3 animation. Works in any modern browser.
  • Option to enable/disable the preloader.
  • Set a custom image
  • Background Color
  • 3 design style
  • Responsive
  • Easy to use
sections.installation:
1. Install All-in-One WP Preloader by uploading the all-in-one-wp-preloader zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate All-in-One WP Preloader through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

  • All-in-One WP Preloader takes a simple, extendable approach to display preloader onto your website.

Can I set a custom image ?

Yes.

How can I change the settings of the preloader?

Navigate to All-in-One WP Preloader. Here you find the panel with all the All-in-One WP Preloader settings.

Will All-in-One WP Preloader slow down my website?

Not at all! All-in-One WP Preloader is built with performance in mind.

Still have some questions?

Please use the support forum.

short_description: All-in-One Preloader helps you to create an awesome preloader that is easy to customize, works on all major browsers and with any wp theme.
